entry.data:
CLEAR
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHEAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
LOWS IN THE MID 30S

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AFTER MIDNIGHT
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS AROUND 50
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 90 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A 50 PERCENT CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S
